name: Baritus Catholic Illustration
description: This business is described as a graphic artist and illustrator that creates Catholic art. They emphasize their rejection of AI-generated art and focus on traditional artistic methods

name: Visual Grace (Kate Capato)
description: Visual Grace is run by Kate Capato, a Catholic Sacred Art Painter, Inspirational Speaker, and Faith-Filled Dance Choreographer. Her work is inspired by the Italian Renaissance and she aims to bring truth, goodness, and beauty to life through her art. She has created art for various parishes and private collections

name: Six Lilies
description: Six Lilies strives to create unique products that illustrate the beauty of the Catholic Faith. The business is inspired by the number of children in the owner's family and the Lilies of St. Joseph, symbolizing purity and chastity. They offer items such as aprons, stickers, and prints

name: Eileen Cunis
description: Eileen Cunis is a Roman Catholic artist who has studied Art History and completed a master's degree in theology with a thesis on the vocation of the Catholic artist. Her inspiration comes from her relationship with Christ, Christian art and spiritual heritage, and the beauty of the natural world

name: Anne Marie
description: Anne Marie works in various classical mediums and has created a series of prints of Saints based on her ink and watercolor originals. She is also available for custom commissions and is an art instructor at a local seminary

name: The Catholic Company
description: This is an online Catholic supply store offering a wide variety of religious items, including books, art, and gifts. They state they are a family-owned and operated business rooted in Catholic values

name: Sanctus Art
description: Mentioned as a place to buy Catholic art online

name: Franciscan Monastery Gift Shop (Washington D.C.)
description: While not in Virginia, this monastery has a gift shop that may carry Catholic art

name: Basilica of the National Shrine of the Immaculate Conception Gift Shop (Washington D.C.)
description: Also not in Virginia, this location has a large gift shop with Catholic icons

name: Holy Cross Abbey Gift Shop (Berryville, VA)
description: This Trappist monastery in Northern Virginia may have artwork in its gift shop. It is recommended to check their opening hours
